section.title: Function
section.para: Used to bind a previously defined function to a key or mouse button. The following example binds mouse button 1 to a function called "Move-or-Raise", whose definition was provided as an example earlier in this man page. After performing this binding fvwm executes the "move-or-raise" function whenever button 1 is pressed in a window's title-bar.
The keyword Function may be omitted if FunctionName does not coincide with an fvwm command.
Warning: Please read the comments on executing complex functions in the section .
